sentences.en: American consumers prefer white eggs; conversely, British buyers like brown eggs.
sentences.cn: 美国的消费者喜欢白色的鸡蛋，而英国的消费者却相反，他们喜欢棕色的鸡蛋。

sentences.en: Conversely , thoughts of loss may enhance physical or psychological pain.
sentences.cn: 反之, 破财的动机可能会加重人的肉体或生理痛苦.

sentences.en: Conversely, all the old forces, however numerous, are bound to be eliminated.
sentences.cn: 而一切旧势力, 不管它们的数量如何庞大, 总是要被消灭的.

sentences.en: Conversely, an expansion is accompanied by a temperature decrease unless heat is added.
sentences.cn: 反之, 如果膨胀时不供给热量,流体的温度就要降低.

sentences.en: Conversely, diffuse or multifocal necrosis is not characteristic of the intrinsic toxins.
sentences.cn: 相反, 扩散性或多病灶性坏死不是内毒素的特性.

sentences.en: Conversely, in many experiments it is possible to measure all the velocity vectors.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 在许多实验中,所有的速度矢量都可以测定.

sentences.en: Conversely, it is possible to create colours by the addition of coloured lights.
sentences.cn: 与此相反, 也能由彩色光相加来获得彩色.

sentences.en: Conversely, on an airplane going east the north - seeking effect might be expected to increase.
sentences.cn: 相反, 如果飞机向东飞行,这北向瞄准的效果好象会增加.

sentences.en: Conversely, some applications represent data as a matrix of many small contiguous pieces of data.
sentences.cn: 与之相反, 有些程序把数据表示为由许多连续的小片数据组成的矩阵.

sentences.en: Conversely, suspended solids are contaminants that can readily be removed through filtration.
sentences.cn: 相反, 悬浮物是指容易从水中过滤出来的物质.

sentences.en: Conversely, test made in full - scale boilers are usually difficult to reconcile.
sentences.cn: 与此相反, 在工业规模的锅炉内所做的试验,也难于互相一致.

sentences.en: Conversely, tests made in full - scale boilers are usually difficult to reconcile.
sentences.cn: 与此相反, 在工业规模的锅炉内所做的试验也难于互相一致.

sentences.en: Conversely, the universe provides a laboratory.
sentences.cn: 反过来, 宇宙空间也可作为实验室.

sentences.en: The conclusion, conversely, help us with our overall comprehension of Chinese apposition.
sentences.cn: 这个结论反过来, 又帮助我们全面地认识现代汉语的同位结构.

sentences.en: You can add the fluid to the powder, or, conversely, the powder to the fluid.
sentences.cn: 可把液体加入粉末，或者相反，把粉末加入液体。

words.tran_cn: 逆行，逆向；倒；相反的事物

trans.tran_cn: 相反地，颠倒地，倒地，反之，反过来
trans.tran_en: used when one situation is the opposite of another
